editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Dryer, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Washer
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Office, Pantry, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: SHOWINGS START APRIL 13, 2015. Home Features: Contemporary architecture with lots of custom features - Rooftop patio with gas line and water (patio furniture and bbq negotiable) - Breakfast patio - Front Porch - Full size basement, ready to be finished - New carpet upstairs - Bamboo wood floorings on main level - Custom paint throughout - 2 car detached garage - Alarm system installed - Washer/Dryer hook ups (upstairs as well as basement) - Complete furnishings negotiable Location: Walkable to: lightrail, breweries, restaurants, curtis park and schools - Easy access to I-70, I-25, downtown, stapleton, city park, cheeseman park - Historical district of Curtis Park neighborhood - Quiet street, nice neighbors - Ample free street parking
response.whatOwnerLoves: Gorgeous Curtis Park townhome, 4 blocks from light rail station, walkable to restaurants, shops and all that Denver has to offer. Rooftop deck with gas, water, ample seating space and perfect mountain and city views.
